articles.description: No. 22 Tennessee basketball topped No. 3 Kansas 64-50 to win the Battle 4 Atlantis on Friday in the Bahamas.
articles.content:
Bill Self has seen Rick Barnes field Tennessee basketball teams that were "as good as anybody in the country" in recent seasons.
